about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: In 2022, while studying marketing, I discovered frontend web development as a complementary skill. What began as a simple curiosity quickly became my true vocation. Since then, I've trained as a web developer with a focus on frontend, while also gaining knowledge in UI/UX design.
about.paragraph2: Lately, I've been exploring backend development, shaping a T-shaped profile with a strong foundation in multiple areas and a clear specialization in frontend.
about.paragraph3: Today, I combine design and programming to create intuitive and efficient digital experiences using modern technologies. I'm always looking to innovate, keep learning, and take every project to the next level.
about.hobby1: I enjoy bowling (although I'm terrible at it)
about.hobby2: I have an orange cat called "Salmorejo" (he's crazy as hell)
about.hobby3: When I'm not getting killed, I usually relax by playing video games.

odin.desc1: I implemented a custom {h1} ("WiStyles") in {h2}, creating a library of reusable patterns and components, and translating it into code using {h3}. This optimized the interface development process and improved communication between design and development teams.
odin.desc2: I designed UI/UX interfaces for new platforms, applying {h1} principles with a {h2} approach to ensure accessibility and usability across all types of devices.
odin.desc3: I developed Single Page Applications (SPA) using the {h1}, integrating the custom Design System to build scalable and maintainable interfaces.
odin.desc3_h1: Vue.js ecosystem (Vue Router, Vue I18n, Pinia)
odin.desc4: I also collaborated on backend tasks, creating and modifying {h1} endpoints with {h2} and {h3}, contributing to more efficient frontend-backend communication.

cozar.desc1: Design, layout, and development of WordPress websites, working from interface creation in {h1} to implementation using {h2}, {h3} (including Bootstrap) and {h4}.
